channel.title: Comments on: Your Chance to Win a Ferrero Easter Gift Box

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Well, I can drool, can't I??

item.title: By: Veronica
item.dc:creator: Veronica
item.description: During Easter, my son would always ask me to make a little something for him to take to his friends. As far as the little ones are concerned they are just happy to receive a basket full of toys or sweets. =) My favourite treat to make for the kids are chocolate nests made of cornflakes and fill them up with colourful jelly beans and mini chocolate eggs. You definitely will see that unusual sparkle in their eyes which is priceless!
item.content:encoded:
During Easter, my son would always ask me to make a little something for him to take to his friends. As far as the little ones are concerned they are just happy to receive a basket full of toys or sweets. =)
My favourite treat to make for the kids are chocolate nests made of cornflakes and fill them up with colourful jelly beans and mini chocolate eggs. You definitely will see that unusual sparkle in their eyes which is priceless!

item.title: By: Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description: I love to buy marshmallow hot cross buns, but I've also recently discovered hot cross bun french toast which is possibly one of the yummiest things ever!
item.content:encoded: I love to buy marshmallow hot cross buns, but I’ve also recently discovered hot cross bun french toast which is possibly one of the yummiest things ever!

item.title: By: Eileen

item.description: Favourite thing to buy??? Ummmm CHOCOLATE!!!!! What else??? Itâ€™s the only time of the year when chocolate miraculously becomes completely calorie free and you can indulge to your heartâ€™s content! Chocolate eggs, cream filled chocolate eggs, chocolate filled chocolate eggs.... speaking of Eggs...Why did the Easter Bunny have to fire the duck? Because he kept quacking all the eggs! :)

item.title: By: Phuoc'n Delicious
item.dc:creator: Phuoc'n Delicious
item.description:
Those were the chocolate eggs that I've been searching for! I remember seeing a new egg variety online somewhere but somehow got mixed up with Lindt! Thanks! Now I gotta find these as they look so good!
I like making hot cross buns
item.content:encoded:
Those were the chocolate eggs that I’ve been searching for! I remember seeing a new egg variety online somewhere but somehow got mixed up with Lindt! Thanks! Now I gotta find these as they look so good!

I like making hot cross buns

item.title: By: Madeleine
item.dc:creator: Madeleine
item.description: Bread and butter pudding with left over hot cross buns! It's egg-xcellent!!
item.content:encoded: Bread and butter pudding with left over hot cross buns! It’s egg-xcellent!!

item.title: By: Lara
item.dc:creator: Lara
item.description: Warm hot cross buns stuffed with melted gooey chocolate Easter eggs!!! - Fererro chocolate Easter eggs of course ;) YUUUUUMMM!!!!
item.content:encoded:
Warm hot cross buns stuffed with melted gooey chocolate Easter eggs!!! – Fererro chocolate Easter eggs of course ðŸ˜‰
YUUUUUMMM!!!!

item.title: By: Khang
item.dc:creator: Khang
item.description: During easter, i love to make creme brulee. When all my friends and family come over to my home my sister and i like to make creme brulee for them to eat. We use the recipe which was presented on masterchef and everybody loves it! i also like to buy some chocolate and melt it and dip marshmallows and strawberrys and bananas in. thats usually what everybody tries to eat before its gone. I usually make my favourite chocolate brownies too. My own recipe. And last year, easter came on the day of my bestfriends 12th birthday, so i made him all of the above treats. HE LOVED IT! :D
item.content:encoded: During easter, i love to make creme brulee. When all my friends and family come over to my home my sister and i like to make creme brulee for them to eat. We use the recipe which was presented on masterchef and everybody loves it! i also like to buy some chocolate and melt it and dip marshmallows and strawberrys and bananas in. thats usually what everybody tries to eat before its gone. I usually make my favourite chocolate brownies too. My own recipe. And last year, easter came on the day of my bestfriends 12th birthday, so i made him all of the above treats. HE LOVED IT! ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Zoe
item.dc:creator: Zoe
item.description: My favourite thing to do is after Easter! IF there is any chocolate left I like to melt it down and dip fruit (to make it seem healthy) into the chocolate. Chocaliciousssssssssssssss!!!
item.content:encoded: My favourite thing to do is after Easter! IF there is any chocolate left I like to melt it down and dip fruit (to make it seem healthy) into the chocolate. Chocaliciousssssssssssssss!!!

item.title: By: Emma
item.dc:creator: Emma
item.description: my favorite thing to make is this delicious lemon mousse, served with pavlova and fresh fruit. best thing evaar...
item.content:encoded: my favorite thing to make is this delicious lemon mousse, served with pavlova and fresh fruit. best thing evaar…
